history.proof: intros x y z e1 e2 H1 H2. unfold prod_ball in *. destruct H1 as [H1_1 H1_2]. destruct H2 as [H2_1 H2_2]. split. - qsimpl use: fct_ball_triangle,fst. srun best use: @ball_triangle. - qsimpl use: snd,fct_ball_triangle,fst. srun best use: @ball_triangle.

ctx: intros x y z e1 e2 H1 H2.
exceptions.tactic: apply (fct_ball_triangle U V (fst x) (fst y) (fst z) e1 e2 H1_1 H2_1).
exceptions.exn: In environment U, V : UniformSpace x, y, z : U * V e1, e2 : R H1_1 : ball (fst x) e1 (fst y) H1_2 : ball (snd x) e1 (snd y) H2_1 : ball (fst y) e2 (fst z) H2_2 : ball (snd y) e2 (snd z) The term "fst x" has type "UniformSpace.sort U" while it is expected to have type "U -> V".

ctx: intros x y z e1 e2 H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: intros x y z e1 e2 H1 H2.
exceptions.tactic: apply (fct_ball_triangle U V (snd x) (snd y) (snd z) e1 e2 H1_2 H2_2).
exceptions.exn: In environment U, V : UniformSpace x, y, z : U * V e1, e2 : R H1_1 : ball (fst x) e1 (fst y) H1_2 : ball (snd x) e1 (snd y) H2_1 : ball (fst y) e2 (fst z) H2_2 : ball (snd y) e2 (snd z) The term "snd x" has type "UniformSpace.sort V" while it is expected to have type "U -> V".

original: intros x y z e1 e2 H1 H2. unfold prod_ball in *. destruct H1 as [H1_1 H1_2]. destruct H2 as [H2_1 H2_2]. split. - apply (fct_ball_triangle U V (fst x) (fst y) (fst z) e1 e2 H1_1 H2_1). - apply (fct_ball_triangle U V (snd x) (snd y) (snd z) e1 e2 H1_2 H2_2).
